news.title: Tesla engaged in deceptive marketing for Autopilot and Full Self-Driving, judge rules

news.title: Tesla misled customers about self-driving features, judge rules
news.summary: Tesla could be temporarily locked out of its biggest US market if it doesn't change deceptive marketing that exaggerates the self-driving capabilities of its cars, the California Department of Motor Vehicles warned on Tuesday, adopting the ruling of an administrative law judge. news.title: People Are Paying to Get Their Chatbots High on ‘Drugs’
